communications.subject: Virginia Freedom of Information Act Request: Communications to/from supvr_atlarge@wytheco.org
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to all emails sent or received by supvr_atlarge@wytheco.org from 1 September, 2024 to 24 October, 2024. Please include any attachments, as well as replies or forwards, to ensure complete context.

If any material is redacted or withheld, I kindly request a brief explanation citing the applicable exemptions.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Robert McWhirter.

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: CPS Board member Email Addresses
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Please provide the CPS email addresses for all current Board Members:

Rev. Mitchell L. Ikenna Johnson
Mary Gardner
Olga Bautista
Michilla Blaise
Debby Pope
Frank Niles Thomas
Dr. Rafael Yañez

This request is made on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani
